text: October 10, 2019. Video obtained Thursday, October 10, 2019 of a man dressed in military-type clothing broadcasting his name before reciting a short statement from the inside of a vehicle. "Hi my name is Anon and I think the Holocaust never happened," he says. The man is the alleged perpetrator of a shooting incident which took place outside a Halle synagogue, in Germany, while dozens of worshipers were observing Yom Kippur, Judaism's holiest day. (AAP VIDEO/StopAntisemitism.org)(NO ARCHIVING AAP VIDEO BEYOND 48 HOURS)
